title: Elegant set of fonts
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141028211240im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot_2014-10-26-07-37-27-1_5520.png)

I go t this lovely picture, which my friend is going to use for her own business, and she cant find out what is the font type in the part where says: la'Blush. She develops her blog and need to use the same type of fonts for consistency...

If anyone were be able to advice...?

Thank you so very very much in advance !! XXX
author: kristinujas

comments.content: Oh wow, thank so very much for super quick response and big thank you from my friend!!! XX
